results.name: a(n) = 4*2^n - 3*n - 5.
comment: This sequence appears alongside the Eulerian numbers A000295 in the batch of sequences generated by the floretion given in the program code.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4, -5, 2).
mathematica: f[n_]:=4*2^n-3*n-5; f[Range[0,20]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jan 28 2011 *)
program: Floretion Algebra Multiplication Program, FAMP Code: 4ibaseisumseq[ - .5'i - .75'j - .5i' - .75j' + .25'ii' + .25'jj' - 1.25'kk' - .25'ik' + .5'jk' - .25'ki' + .5'kj' + .75e]; sumtype: Y[8] = (int)Y[6] - (int)Y[7] + Y[8] + sum (internal program code)
results.author: _Creighton Dement_, Aug 22 2005
